name: PONG (itch) (Julesdowork)
description:
Play the classic Atari game right in your web browser! Use your keyboard to move your paddle and try to knock the ball into your opponent's goal.

How to Play

Player 1 Controls:
W: Move Up
S: Move Down

Player 2 Controls:
Up Arrow: Move Up
Down Arrow: Move Down

Features

Play against a computer or another human player
Three difficulty modes to challenge yourself with
Change the score needed to win (default is 11 points)

Credits
